title: Jesús Pérez (footballer, born 1995)
text:
Jesús Pérez (born September 11, 1995 in <a href="Trinidad%20and%20Tobago">Trinidad and Tobago</a>) is a <a href="Trinidad">Trinidad</a>ian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="FC%20Istiqlol%20Fergana">Istiqlol</a>.
International career.
Pérez made his international debut in a 2–0 win over <a href="Barbados%20national%20football%20team">Barbados</a> in March 2017, coming on as a substitute for <a href="Daneil%20Cyrus">Daneil Cyrus</a>.
